item.title: John add a quote by Daisaku Ikeda
item.description: "A great human revolution in just a single individual will help achieve a change in the destiny of a nation and, further, can even enable a change in the destiny of all humankind." -- Daisaku Ikeda

item.title: John add a quote by Lewis Carroll
